languages.text: {n}Кассия вздыхает.{/n} "{name}, пусть ваше раскованное поведение меня и смущает, проблема не в нем. Я... никогда не рисовала людей. Если вы настаиваете, чтобы я составила вам компанию... Я готова рисовать что-то свое, но не вас".

{n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия вздыхает.{/n} "{name}, пусть ваше раскованное поведение меня и смущает, проблема не в нем. Я... никогда не рисовала людей. Если вы настаиваете, чтобы я составила вам компанию... Я готова рисовать что-то свое, но не вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, as much as I am discomforted by your licentious conduct, the real predicament is something else. I... have never painted people before. If you insist that I keep you company... I will paint something of my own choosing, but not you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, as much as I am discomforted by your licentious conduct, the real predicament is something else. I... have never painted people before. If you insist that I keep you company... I will paint something of my own choosing, but not you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle soupire.{/n} « {name}, aussi déconcertée que je sois par votre comportement et votre demande éhontée, je dois avouer que... je n'ai encore jamais fait le portrait de qui que ce soit. Si vous insistez pour que je vous tienne compagnie, je veux bien vous faire profiter de mon art, mais je peindrai le sujet de mon choix et ce ne sera pas vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle soupire.{/n} « {name}, aussi déconcertée que je sois par votre comportement et votre demande éhontée, je dois avouer que... je n'ai encore jamais fait le portrait de qui que ce soit. Si vous insistez pour que je vous tienne compagnie, je veux bien vous faire profiter de mon art, mais je peindrai le sujet de mon choix et ce ne sera pas vous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Suspira.{/n} «{name}, aunque su solicitud es absolutamente inapropiada y su conducta actual me resulta desconcertante, la verdad es que... nunca he retratado a nadie. Si insiste en que l{mf|e|a} acompañe, puedo pintar algo a mi elección, pero no a usted».
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suspira.{/n} «{name}, aunque su solicitud es absolutamente inapropiada y su conducta actual me resulta desconcertante, la verdad es que... nunca he retratado a nadie. Si insiste en que l{mf|e|a} acompañe, puedo pintar algo a mi elección, pero no a usted».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她叹了口气。{/n}“{name}，尽管我认为你的要求完全不得体，而且我对你这样的行为感到困惑不已，但老实说……我之前从来没画过人像。如果你坚持要我陪伴你的话，我想画我自己感兴趣的东西，我没办法画你。”
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."

traits.locale_text: {n}她叹了口气。{/n}“{name}，尽管我认为你的要求完全不得体，而且我对你这样的行为感到困惑不已，但老实说……我之前从来没画过人像。如果你坚持要我陪伴你的话，我想画我自己感兴趣的东西，我没办法画你。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女はため息をついた。{/n}「{name}、あなたの要求はまったく不適切で、あなたの現在の行動には困惑していますが、実は…私は人を描いたことがありません。どうしてもお付き合い願いたいのであれば、私が選んだものを描きますが、あなたを描くことは出来ません」
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はため息をついた。{/n}「{name}、あなたの要求はまったく不適切で、あなたの現在の行動には困惑していますが、実は…私は人を描いたことがありません。どうしてもお付き合い願いたいのであれば、私が選んだものを描きますが、あなたを描くことは出来ません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "{name}, ich halte Eure Bitte zwar für vollkommen unangemessen und bin verblüfft über Euer Verhalten, doch die Wahrheit ist ... Ich habe noch niemals jemanden gemalt. Wenn Ihr auf meiner Gesellschaft besteht, male ich etwas von mir Gewähltes, nicht jedoch Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "{name}, ich halte Eure Bitte zwar für vollkommen unangemessen und bin verblüfft über Euer Verhalten, doch die Wahrheit ist ... Ich habe noch niemals jemanden gemalt. Wenn Ihr auf meiner Gesellschaft besteht, male ich etwas von mir Gewähltes, nicht jedoch Euch."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}İç çekiyor.{/n} "{name}, her ne kadar talebinin son derece uygunsuz bulsam ve mevcut davranışın karşısında şaşkına dönmüş olsam da işin gerçeği... Ben daha önce kimsenin resmini yapmadım. Eğer sana eşlik etmemi istiyorsan kendi seçtiğim bir şeyi resmedeceğim, seni değil."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "{name}, although I find your request entirely inappropriate and am baffled by your current conduct, the truth is... I have never painted anyone before. If you insist on my company, I will paint something of my own choosing, but I will not paint you."
